name: House Flipping Simulator
description:
House Flipping Simulator is an arcade simulator game, where your main task is to renovate old and dirty houses and then sell them on a higher price! Start by buying the cheapest house and do your job! Clean the house, paint the walls and floors, add some new furniture! And then start flipping houses to become rich! Be creative and make your own house design.

In House Flipping Simulator there are so many ways how you can renovate the house. At first you have to clean the house and remove all the trash by using brush! After that you should paint walls with bolster and craft your own vision and style of the house. You can access shop by using your tablet device and by there new furniture, electronic devices and much more! In this simulator game you will learn the basics of real estate business. It's time to discover new experience! Good luck!
